entries.title_d: We have received a distress call from one of our diplomats near to you. Him and his retinue was ambushed by Imperial fighters and are floating around in space with disabled engines while an Imperial Shuttle is closing in to capture them. Hurry over there and transfer repair hardware to them.
entries.title: Dathomir system: Rescue the Rebel diplomat.
entries.thanks_5: Please let that be the last of them...
entries.thanks_4: I hope they get the picture and leave us alone, this is madness!
entries.thanks_3: You think they would give up after all those casaulties..
entries.thanks_2: I guess it was us or them eh?
entries.taunt_5: The great Empire wants the people on that ship for questioning, or dead, it's your choice!
entries.taunt_4: You are all known Rebels, if you don't stop immediately, we have the right to terminate you.
entries.taunt_3: That man is wanted for questioning, surrender now or we have no choice but to destroy you.
entries.taunt_2: Cut your engines immediately or we will destroy you!
entries.taunt_1: You are not going anywhere Rebels!
entries.rescue_phase_2: We have the spare parts. Our technician says he will have our ship running in no time.
entries.rescue_phase_1: We are so glad to see you pilot! Who knows what might have happened to us if you weren't here.
entries.rescue_abandoned: What are you doing pilot?! If I survive this I will have you incarcerated!
entries.recovery_success: They will be safe from here pilot. Good job.
entries.quest_location_d: Be careful on your way to the diplomats vessel and try not to attract more enemy presence. You need to still keep a good speed though as that Imperial shuttle is closing in to capture the diplomat.
entries.quest_escort_d: The Empire have undoubtedly spotted you by now and will send fighters to try and disable or destroy the diplomats ship. Escort him to safety.
entries.quest_dock_d: Dock with the diplomats ship and transfer over tools and spare parts so they can repair their engines. Defend them from any enemies while they are repairing their ship.
entries.panic_5: You'd think they have something better to do!
entries.panic_4: I'm starting to get really angry. We have not done anything to warrant this!
entries.panic_3: I guess trying to talk to them would be pointless?
entries.panic_1: Me and my crew are not fighters! The evil Empire has no honor!
entries.failed_destroy: We lost contact with the diplomats vessel! You can't seem to get anything right today can you pilot? Return to base immediately!
entries.docking_started: I'm sure that the Empire left some fighters in the area so dock and transfer those spare parts quickly.
entries.docking_complete: They got the spare parts. As soon as they are up and running, escort them out of there.
entries.complete: Too bad about the Inquisitor but the day wasn't a complete loss. Return to base.
entries.attack_stopped: Tactical Computer: < No more fighter vessels within sensor range. >
entries.attack_notify: Tactical Computer: < No more fighter vessels within sensor range. >
entries.arrival_phase_2: Get over to their location before an Imperial Shuttle reach him. Transfer some spare part so they can fix their ship.
entries.arrival_phase_1: A Rebel diplomat and his retinue were ambushed by some Imperial fighters and is drifting in space, they need our help.
entries.abort: What are you doing pilot?! If I survive this I will have you incarcerated!
